projects.title: BookPilot — Library-to-Home Delivery System
projects.description: A modern library delivery management system enabling users to request book pickup and delivery from nearby libraries. Features include smart search, order tracking, wishlist system, payment integration, and role-based dashboards for users, librarians, and admins.

projects.title: Artify — Creative Artwork Showcase
projects.description: A modern art-sharing platform where artists can upload, display, and manage artworks with categories, likes, favorites, and private galleries. Includes Firebase authentication, responsive UI, dark/light mode, and smooth animations.

projects.title: GizmoGrid — Next.js eCommerce Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive eCommerce platform with Google OAuth authentication, protected product management dashboard, search and category filters, and responsive design. Features public product browsing and secure user-specific product listings.

projects.title: GreenNest — Indoor Plant Care & Shopping
projects.description: GreenNest is a modern single-page web application for plant lovers, offering plant shopping, care guides, customer reviews, and expert consultation booking. Built with Firebase authentication and smooth React Router navigation.

projects.title: Hero IO — App Store Showcase
projects.description: A responsive and interactive app store web application where users can browse, search, sort, and install apps. Includes detailed app pages, review charts, installation management, and smooth UI animations.
